nodes.text: The Garollia system was a star system located in the Baroli sector of the galactic regions known as the Expansion Region and the Trailing Sectors. It was home to the creatures known as Garollian ghost vipers.
The Garollia system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square N-15.
